Plot: Seventeen-year-old Lily, half-mermaid and half-human, has been living on land and attending high school, where she develops a crush on a boy but is afraid to tell him of her true destiny as the ruler of the undersea kingdom of Thalassinia.
Characters: Peri, Waterlily (Lily) Sanderson, Quince Fletcher, Dosinia Sanderson, King Whelk Sanderson, Brody Bennett, Shannen
